name: DIES IRAE
description:
DISCLAIMER : This game is an art project, an extension of the themes and imagery I explore in my collage works, created for people to play during my exhibitions. It's made out of pieces of various images, from classic paintings to shit found on the Internet. I'm no game designer, and I'm not pretending it's a good game : it's totally stupid, has poor animation and gameplay, you might get stuck for no reason, and there's not even a real goal. So no need for any hating or trolling : if you don't like it or just don't get it, don't play !

And if you'd like to know more about what i do :

http://stab-art.com/

https://www.behance.net/stab

https://www.facebook.com/Stabeor/
